PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_ValveTypeAirRelease
PropertySetDef.Definition: Valve used to release air from a pipe or fitting. Note that an air release valve is constrained to have a single port pattern

PropertyDef.Name: IsAutomatic
PropertyDef.Definition: Indication of whether the valve is automatically operated (TRUE) or manually operated (FALSE).

DefinitionAliases.DefinitionAlias: 弁が自動(TRUE)で操作されるか手動(FALSE)で操作されるかの表示
